pkgmetadata.longdescription: GarpixCMS=========Start new project with GarpixCMS--------------------------------.. code-block:: bash pip install cookiecutter cookiecutter https://github.com/garpixcms/garpixcms-empty-template # Enter name for your website... cd website # See README.md of project cat README.mdChangelog=========See `CHANGELOG.md <CHANGELOG.md>`_.Contributing============See `CONTRIBUTING.md <CONTRIBUTING.md>`_.License=======`MIT <LICENSE>`_
